participant_1.background:
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city.
I wear contacts now.
i played football in high school.
I don't like to talk about my favorite food.

participant_2.background:
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i have 3 cats.
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my favourite food is ice cream.

content.text: Hi there, I'm an officer in the police force. What do you do for a living?
I'm a lawyer. I've worked for a few different law firms and have even started my own.
That's impressive! I've always been interested in law but I don't think I have the patience to study for that long.
You're right, it is a lot of work. But it's worth it when you finally get to practice.
What's your favorite part about being a lawyer?
I like helping people and making a difference in the world. I also enjoy the challenge of working on complex legal cases.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also enjoy reading, watching movies, and listening to music.
What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm always a fan of a good mystery or thriller.
I like those too! I've been reading a lot of Stephen King lately.
He's a great author! I've read a few of his books.
I'm glad you like him! I think he's one of the best horror writers of all time.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I hope you have a great day!
